labels.T1: PAYG withholding where no ABN is quoted
labels.T2: PAYG withholding for payments to foreign residents
labels.T3: PAYG withholding from investment income payments
labels.T4: PAYG withholding from superannuation income streams
labels.W1: Total salary, wages and other payments
labels.W2: Amounts withheld from payments shown at W1

notes: BAS labels align to the standard Business Activity Statement instructions for GST and PAYG withholding.
Label descriptions support mapping outputs for the tax engine.
